Takes awhile to get into, and know which perks to run, but its a fun game

This game has developed a "cult" following that really is well deserved. This is a fun game and  my main account I play with is on PS4, so I barely play on PC. But even then DBD has garnered a lot of attention and the devs/DBD team are so supportive of the community. This is a game I will cherish for a long time. Thank you Dead By Daylight. C: Even if this game has bugs or some toxicity, in the end of all that ruckus, is a passion project that has upgraded and improved so much since it first came out. I definitely respect everyone and what they are trying to do for the community and the game. Dead By Daylight will only continue to have success and I can't wait to see what comes next for the game!
Don't even consider getting this game, it has the most toxic player base, runs like shit on pc, expensive dlc and worst community i have ever seen.

so far that game is a lot of fun. i enjoy the adrenaline rush i get when playing! it's also cool to see classic horror things in the game! Has a few flaws, but i think overall they don't take away too much from the game to make it really enjoyable.
a game that you'll tend to hate but can't quit playing.
Yeah, after a certain day of my life, I realized I wasted time on this game.

I've been playing this game fora bit now and not gonna lie it's fun. I find enjoyment both when playing survivor and killer. Sure sometimes you run into people you don't like because they camp or tunnel, but if you look past that the game is well structured. I find both sides to be balanced and the games DLC are in a reasonable price range. I haven't encountered any glitches except floating survivors. I would rate this game a solid 8/10. It's really good, but there's still some room for improvement. Good job to the developers!


EDIT:

The QOL in this game has been improved drastically. This game is now even better than it was when I posted my last review and I've started playing it a lot again recently due to it. The new additions to the game are also very interesting. If you like this sort of game I currently 10/10 recommend it. Super fun if you don't get face camped.
